xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 13 Parittattika » 13.1 Paṭiccavāra » 13.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 13.1.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Ārammaṇa
Parittattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Ārammaṇa
5.
1879Parittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paritto dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—  parittaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā. (1)
1880Parittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca mahaggato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—  paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuṃ paṭicca mahaggatā khandhā. (2)
1881Mahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca mahaggato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—  mahaggataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
1882Appamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appamāṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—  appamāṇaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe… . (1)
1883Parittañca mahaggatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca mahaggato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā—  paṭisandhikkhaṇe mahaggataṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paṭicca tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe… . (1)
<< Hetuup Adhipati >>
